title: Win It Weekly: ROTOR Aldhu Carbon crank
content:

How does Win It Weekly work?

Simply fill out the form below for your chance to win a ROTOR Aldhu Carbon crank with a 1x or 2x ring set

Prize:

  • ROTOR Aldu Carbon crank
  • Value up to MSRP US$750.00

Prize Details:

At 523g for a crank and 2x ring setup, Aldhu Carbon is ROTOR’s premier crank for road and gravel. It features their award-winning modular system with a feather-light carbon crank arm. This innovative system reduces the number of parts in a crank system, lightening the crankset while enhancing stiffness and performance. The modular interface allows Carbon Aldhu to be built up with 1x or 2x ring sets and chain lines to complement any modern road or gravel bicycle.
